Hi,
I downloaded the JUnit3.8 zip file, and just replaced my junit3.7 jar with
the new one,
and i get a java.lang.NoSuchMethodError everyplace that i use an
assertEquals() to compare
strings. The readme didn't seem to help.
Is anybody else having a similar problem, or am i missing something obvious?
Thanks,
Nilesh

Mike Clark wrote:

> Just in case you missed the annoucement, JUnit 3.8 is now available.
